description.value:
The Patron you choose lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

The Fiend
Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.QVrWCZrGqO61xcmm]{Fire Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.C3uvPVk3rv4o9IB0]{Resistance}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.V1CIk7dq1PWWmMGh]{Burning Hands}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.FVpIU1YwW6glC8Xz]{Command}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.mycojDbHOZg2luJc]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.RSKqQMpJzJEkJi2G]{Scorching Ray}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.9Nwb4q2pSQ3qOVBa]{Fireball}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.3qKA9Ojxpr2u04kO]{Stinking Cloud}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.Ry3YprRRYTovxvuf]{Fire Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.ENNqEl6gNkR8pgHv]{Wall of Fire}
